name: It cannot die so you must not kill it.
name_original: It cannot die so you must not kill it.
description:
"This is it. The last sunflower on Old Earth. They can’t have it. I can’t let them. It cannot die so you must not kill it.”

Welcome to Old Earth (we don’t talk about what happened on New Earth)!

There is one sunflower left on the planet. It is yours.

You have ten seconds to destroy all of the investigators to make sure it stays yours.

Good luck!

A Ludum Dare 51 Entry by Absurdity Interactive

Good art by Sorray

The rest of it by Lukas
